scriptLines: NavBlueCSVreallyXML parse(EstOutTime = {_col0_} ? (FlightPlan as (FlightPlanSummary as (OutTime as (EstimatedTime as (Value as string))))),
TakeOffFuelDuration = {_col0_} ? (FlightPlan as (FuelHeader as (TakeOffFuel as (Duration as (Value as string))))),
TakeOffFuelEstWeight = {_col0_} ? (FlightPlan as (FuelHeader as (TakeOffFuel as (EstimatedWeight as (Value as ({@unit} as string,
ArrFuelEstWeight = {_col0_} ? (FlightPlan as (FuelHeader as (ArrivalFuel as (EstimatedWeight as (Value as ({@unit} as string,
FltNbr = {_col0_} ? (FlightPlan as (M633SupplementaryHeader as (Flight as (FlightIdentification as (FlightNumber as ({@number} as string)))))),

HTML as (HEAD as (link as ({@rel} as string, {@type} as string, {@href} as string), STYLE as ({@type} as string, {_value_} as string), TITLE as string), BODY as (DIV as (P as ({@class} as string, {_value_} as string)[], BR as string[], PRE as (font as ({@color} as string, {_value_} as string)[], {_value_} as string[])[], {@id} as string, {_value_} as string))),

{s:Envelope} as ({s:Header} as ({o:Security} as ({u:Timestamp} as ({u:Created} as string, {u:Expires} as string, {u:@Id} as string), {s:@mustUnderstand} as integer)), {s:Body} as (GetFlightListResponse as (Error as ({xsi:@nil} as boolean), Warning as ({xsi:@nil} as boolean), ExecutionTimeSec as double, Flights as (Key as (WhoAlc as string, FltNum as integer, StdUtc as string, OrigApt as string, TestFlight as boolean, RepeatNumber as integer), DestApt as ({xsi:@nil} as boolean), AircraftId as ({xsi:@nil} as boolean), AtcAlc as ({xsi:@nil} as boolean))[])))

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		shift_id as string,
		user_id as string,
		name as string,
		start_time as string,
		end_time as string,
		type as string,
		is_work as boolean,
		is_reserve as boolean,
		is_sick as boolean,
		is_training as boolean,
		is_vacation as boolean,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFShift
SFShift derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		shift_id as string,
		user_id as string,
		name as string,
		start_time as timestamp,
		end_time as timestamp,
		type as string,
		is_work as boolean,
		is_reserve as boolean,
		is_sick as boolean,
		is_training as boolean,
		is_vacation as boolean,
		updated_at as string,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SHIFTtoSQL

properties.description: Filters yesterday NavBlue Flight List for flights that actually operated in SF.

transformations.name: CompToSFflights
transformations.description: Compare yesterday's NavBlue flights to flights that actually operated in SF. Pass thru NavBlue flights that actually operated.

transformations.name: JoinToAirports
transformations.description: Retrieve ICAO airport codes from SF Airports table to add to SF Flight data.  ICAO airport code is needed as part of primary key to match against NavBlue flight list.

scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT flight_number, CAST(scheduled_departure AS DATE) AS 'SCHED_DEP_DATE'
, scheduled_departure
, sched_depart_airport_id
FROM dbo.SF_FLIGHT_PROD
WHERE aircraft_registration_number IS NOT NULL
AND is_canceled = 'false'
AND CAST(scheduled_departure AS DATE) = DATEADD(day,-1,CONVERT(date, GETUTCDATE()))',

properties.description: Adds "FLIGHT_TYPE," "FLIGHT_SUBTYPE" and "FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT" columns to Flight table in SQL Server.

sources.name: FltNbrRangeMatrixCSV
sources.description:
Import data from Flt_nbr_range_matrix_csv.
MUST FORMAT DATES AS "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.description: Splits flight data into two sets: one with flight numbers beginning with "CMB" and another for purely numeric flight numbers.

transformations.name: STDfltnbrRevCat
transformations.description: Changes flight data "flt_type" to "flight_type" and flt number range data "FLIGHT_TYPE" to "REVENUE_TYPE"

transformations.name: CMBfltnbrRevCat
transformations.description: Assigns "DOD Int'l" revenue type to all flight numbers beginning with "CMB."

transformations.name: TrunkFltType
transformations.description: Renames "flight_type" to "flt_type" to avoid duplicate column names with "FLIGHT_TYPE" in FltNbrRangeMatrix.

transformations.name: ChgColOrder
transformations.description: Reorder columns to match orig. dbo.SF_FLIGHT_PROD.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_arrive_airport_id as string,
		actual_depart_airport_id as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_oooi_in as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_off as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_on as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_out as timestamp,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		base_airport as string,
		base_airport_id as string,
		cargo_off as integer,
		cargo_on as integer,
		cargo_weight as integer,
		estimated_arrival as timestamp,
		estimated_departure as timestamp,
		flight_date as date,
		flight_id as integer,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_type as string,
		fuel_in as double,
		fuel_out as double,
		fuel_uplift as integer,
		fuel_uplifts as string,
		is_canceled as string,
		is_verified as string,
		lndg_actual_braking as string,
		lndg_midfield as string,
		lndg_rollout as string,
		lndg_touchdown_zone as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		notes as string,
		ops_type as string,
		sched_arrive_airport_id as string,
		sched_depart_airport_id as string,
		scheduled_arrival as timestamp,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure as timestamp,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLFltData
source(output(
		EFF_DATE as string,
		END_DATE as string,
		BEGIN_FLT_NBR as string,
		END_FLT_NBR as string,
		FLIGHT_TYPE as string,
		FLIGHT_SUBTYPE as string,
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FltNbrRangeMatrixCSV
SQLFltData split(startsWith(flight_number,'CMB'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(CMBfltnbr, STDfltnbr)
ChgFltNumToString select(mapColumn(
		actual_arrival_airport,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_oooi_in,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_out,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		base_airport,
		base_airport_id,
		cargo_off,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_weight,
		estimated_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		flight_date,
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_type = flt_type,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		is_canceled,
		is_verified,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		maint_log_page,
		notes,
		ops_type,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		scheduled_arrival,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID,
		REVENUE_TYPE = FLIGHT_TYPE,
		REVENUE_SUBTYPE = FLIGHT_SUBTYPE,
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> STDfltnbrRevCat
ConditionalSplit1@CMBfltnbr derive(REVENUE_TYPE = "DOD Int'l",
		REVENUE_SUBTYPE = "International",
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT = "DOD") ~> CMBfltnbrRevCat
CMBfltnbrRevCat, STDfltnbrRevCat union(byName: true)~> UnionCMBandSTDfltnbrs
ConditionalSplit1@STDfltnbr derive(flight_number = toInteger(flight_number),
		scheduled_departure = toString(scheduled_departure)) ~> ChangeFltNumToINT
ChangeFltNumToINT select(mapColumn(
		actual_arrival_airport,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_oooi_in,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_out,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		base_airport,
		base_airport_id,
		cargo_off,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_weight,
		estimated_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		flight_date,
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flt_type = flight_type,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		is_canceled,
		is_verified,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		maint_log_page,
		notes,
		ops_type,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		scheduled_arrival,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TrunkFltType
JoinToFltNbrRangeMatrix derive(flight_number = toString(flight_number),
		scheduled_departure = toTimestamp(scheduled_departure,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) ~> ChgFltNumToString
TrunkFltType, ChangeBegEndFltNbrToInt join(flight_number >= BEGIN_FLT_NBR
	&& flight_number <= END_FLT_NBR
	&& scheduled_departure >= EFF_DATE
	&& scheduled_departure <= END_DATE,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinToFltNbrRangeMatrix
FltNbrRangeMatrixCSV derive(BEGIN_FLT_NBR = toInteger(BEGIN_FLT_NBR),
		END_FLT_NBR = toInteger(END_FLT_NBR)) ~> ChangeBegEndFltNbrToInt
UnionCMBandSTDfltnbrs select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		actual_oooi_out,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_in,
		estimated_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		cargo_weight,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_off,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		maint_log_page,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		REVENUE_TYPE,
		REVENUE_SUBTYPE,
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChgColOrder
ChgColOrder sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FltDataToSQL

source(output(
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_arrive_airport_id as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLFltData
source(output(
		EFF_DATE as timestamp 'yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss',
		END_DATE as timestamp 'yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss',
		BEGIN_FLT_NBR as integer '##0',
		END_FLT_NBR as integer '##0',
		FLIGHT_TYPE as string,
		FLIGHT_SUBTYPE as string,
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FltNbrRangeMatrix
SQLFltData split(startsWith(flight_number,'CMB'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(CMBfltnbr, STDfltnbr)
TrunkFltType, FltNbrRangeMatrix lookup(flight_number >= BEGIN_FLT_NBR
	&& flight_number <= END_FLT_NBR
	&& scheduled_departure >= EFF_DATE
	&& scheduled_departure <= END_DATE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'right')~> LookupToFltNbrRange
ChgFltNumToString select(mapColumn(
		actual_arrival_airport,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_oooi_in,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_out,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		base_airport,
		base_airport_id,
		cargo_off,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_weight,
		estimated_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		flight_date,
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_type = flt_type,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		is_canceled,
		is_verified,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		maint_log_page,
		notes,
		ops_type,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		scheduled_arrival,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID,
		REVENUE_TYPE = FLIGHT_TYPE,
		REVENUE_SUBTYPE = FLIGHT_SUBTYPE,
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> STDfltnbrRevCat
ConditionalSplit1@CMBfltnbr derive(REVENUE_TYPE = "DOD Int'l",
		REVENUE_SUBTYPE = "International",
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT = "DOD") ~> CMBfltnbrRevCat
CMBfltnbrRevCat, STDfltnbrRevCat union(byName: true)~> UnionCMBandSTDfltnbrs
ConditionalSplit1@STDfltnbr derive(flight_number = toInteger(flight_number)) ~> ChangeFltNumToINT
ChangeFltNumToINT select(mapColumn(
		actual_arrival_airport,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_oooi_in,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_out,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		base_airport,
		base_airport_id,
		cargo_off,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_weight,
		estimated_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		flight_date,
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flt_type = flight_type,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		is_canceled,
		is_verified,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		maint_log_page,
		notes,
		ops_type,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		scheduled_arrival,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TrunkFltType
LookupToFltNbrRange derive(flight_number = toString(flight_number)) ~> ChgFltNumToString
UnionCMBandSTDfltnbrs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FltDataToSQL

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.description: Splits flight data into two sets: one with flight numbers beginning with "CMB" and another for purely numeric flight numbers.

transformations.name: STDfltnbrRevCat
transformations.description: Changes flight data "flt_type" back to "flight_type" and changes flt number range data "FLIGHT_TYPE" to "REVENUE_TYPE"

transformations.name: CMBfltnbrRevCat
transformations.description: Assigns "DOD Int'l" revenue type to all flight numbers beginning with "CMB."

transformations.name: TrunkFltType
transformations.description: Renaming flight_type to flt_type to avoid duplicate column names with FLIGHT_TYPE column in FltNbrRangeMatrix.

transformations.name: ChgFltNumToString
transformations.description: Changes "flight_number" back to string from integer.

		lndg_actual_braking,

		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID,
		REVENUE_TYPE = FLIGHT_TYPE,
		REVENUE_SUBTYPE = FLIGHT_SUBTYPE,
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> STDfltnbrRevCat
ConditionalSplit1@CMBfltnbr derive(REVENUE_TYPE = "DOD Int'l",
		REVENUE_SUBTYPE = "International",
		FLT_TYPE_OPS_REPORT = "DOD") ~> CMBfltnbrRevCat
CMBfltnbrRevCat, STDfltnbrRevCat union(byName: true)~> UnionCMBandSTDfltnbrs
ConditionalSplit1@STDfltnbr derive(flight_number = toInteger(flight_number)) ~> ChangeFltNumToINT
ChangeFltNumToINT select(mapColumn(
		actual_arrival_airport,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_oooi_in,
		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_out,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		base_airport,
		base_airport_id,
		cargo_off,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_weight,
		estimated_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		flight_date,
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flt_type = flight_type,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		is_canceled,
		is_verified,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		maint_log_page,
		notes,
		ops_type,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		scheduled_arrival,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TrunkFltType
JoinToFltNbrRangeMatrix derive(flight_number = toString(flight_number)) ~> ChgFltNumToString
TrunkFltType, FltNbrRangeMatrix join(between(flight_number,BEGIN_FLT_NBR,END_FLT_NBR) && between(scheduled_departure,EFF_DATE,END_DATE),
	joinType:'cross',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinToFltNbrRangeMatrix
UnionCMBandSTDfltnbrs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FltDataToSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		user_id as string,
		category_type as string,
		effective_start as string,
		effective_end as string,
		base_icao_code as string,
		base_iata_code as string,
		base_faa_code as string,
		base_name as string,
		equipment_group_name as string,
		equipment_group_code as string,
		position_name as string,
		position_code as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFUserCategory
SFUserCategory derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> USERCATEGORYtoSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFUser
SFUser derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> USERtoSQL
